description.message: Syncs your browser data with a secure and anonymous xBrowserSync service.

introduction.message:
Enter a secret word that will be used to encrypt and decrypt your data when syncing.

If you already have an xBrowserSync ID, enter it here with the corresponding secret and your synced data will be retrieved. Otherwise, your local data will be synced and a new xBrowserSync ID will be created for you.

You can change the xBrowserSync service to sync to in the Settings panel.

confirmReplaceBookmarks_Message.message: xBrowserSync data will overwrite local browser data. OK to proceed?

serviceStatus_Message.message: Check current service status or sync to a different xBrowserSync service by changing the service URL here.

serviceStatus_NoNewSyncs.message: Online but not accepting new syncs

updateServiceUrlForm_Description.message: Enter the URL of an alternative xBrowserSync service. When you change the service URL, any current sync will be disabled and you'll then need to create a new sync, unless you already have a corresponding xBrowserSync ID for that service.

backupRestore_Message.message:
You can backup your xBrowserSync data here in order to restore your data when necessary.

If sync is not enabled, backup and restore will affect local browser data only.

backupSuccess_Message.message: Your data has been backed up to {fileName}, check downloaded files for the location.

restoreForm_Message.message: Copy the contents of a backup file to restore data.

syncPanel_Message.message:
Start syncing with xBrowserSync now! If you already have an xBrowserSync ID you can use it to sync your existing data.

Optionally you can disable syncing changes to the Bookmarks bar, handy if you want to sync your bookmarks to multiple browsers but prefer them to display different links in the Bookmarks bar.

confirmRestore_Sync_Message.message: As sync is currently enabled, the data being restored will overwrite your xBrowserSync data. To restore to the local browser only disable sync before restoring. OK to proceed?

confirmRestore_NoSync_Message.message: As sync is currently disabled, the data being restored will overwrite the local browser data. OK to proceed?

error_Default_Message.message: Something went wrong, can't tell you what though unfortunately. If the problem persists get in touch with the xBrowserSync team.

error_HttpRequestFailed_Message.message: Couldn't connect to the xBrowserSync service, check the service status in the settings panel.

error_TooManyRequests_Message.message: Too many requests sent, sync has been disabled. Re-enable sync to resume syncing.

error_RequestEntityTooLarge_Message.message: Unable to sync your data as the xBrowserSync service is limiting sync size to

error_NotAcceptingNewSyncs_Message.message: Unable to sync as this xBrowserSync service is not currently accepting new syncs. If you have already created a sync using this service URL enter your xBrowserSync ID, or choose a different service to sync to.

error_DailyNewSyncLimitReached_Message.message: Unable to create new sync as you have reached your daily new sync limit for this xBrowserSync service. Sync with an existing xBrowserSync ID or try again tomorrow.

error_MissingClientData_Message.message: Check the values in the xBrowserSync panel and then re-enable sync.

error_NoDataFound_Message.message: Double check your xBrowserSync ID and secret and try again.

error_NoDataToRestore_Message.message: Make sure you have provided valid xBrowserSync data before restoring.

error_FailedGetLocalBookmarks_Message.message: An error occurred when trying to retrieve local bookmarks.

error_FailedCreateLocalBookmarks_Message.message: An error occurred when trying to create a local bookmark.

error_FailedRemoveLocalBookmarks_Message.message: An error occurred when trying to overwrite local bookmarks.

error_InvalidData_Message.message: Ensure your secret is identical to the one used when initially syncing for this ID.

error_LastChangeNotSynced_Message.message: The last change was not synced due to a bookmarks conflict. It would be a good idea to disable and re-enable sync before continuing.

error_OutOfSync_Message.message: The last change was not synced due to a bookmarks conflict. It would be a good idea to disable and re-enable sync before continuing.

error_BrowserImportBookmarksNotSupported.message: Browser import bookmarks functionality is not supported in xBrowserSync. Create a new sync to sync your newly imported bookmarks.

error_NotImplemented_Message.message: A required function has not been implemented and is causing xBrowserSync to not function correctly.

error_SyncInterrupted_Message.message: A previous sync was interrupted and failed to complete. Re-enable sync to restore your synced data.
